mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, content) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select boardno, title, writer, content, TO_CHAR(createdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createdate, hit from board order by boardno desc
SELECT boardno, title, writer, content, createdate, hit FROM board WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' ORDER BY boardno DESC
